contentrichtext.text: '''This page is an archive of the discussion surrounding a page which has now been deleted. Please do not add to this archive. Requests for undeletion can be made at [[Wikipedia:votes for undeletion]].''' From Cleanup: Has languished at the top of [[wikipedia:Orphaned Articles]] for weeks. No one seems to know what to do with it. I sure don't. Any takers? *Should go to VFD [[User:Maroux|Maroux]] *I've rewritten it to NPOV, but would not care much if it was VfDd. --[[User:Tagishsimon|Tagishsimon]] *a worthy topic, but still too POV; only a full rewrite will fix [[User:Dwindrim|Denni]] *I do not think it is worthy. It's a boast sheet for a partizan website of no significance, which has a convincing name and aspirations far beyond its grasp. --[[User:Tagishsimon|Tagishsimon]] * If it actually had some inbound links, ''maybe''. But as it stands, delete. -- [[User:Cyrius|Cyrius]]|[[User talk:Cyrius|&#9998]] 17:18, Apr 4, 2004 (UTC)
